description: Legal counsel requests a PDF containing source URLs for compliance flags on Acme Corp; the assistant fetches compliance data, creates a markdown summary, exports it to PDF, and returns a secure download link.

messages.content: You are VendorReliance AI, an agentic assistant that gathers financial statements, news alerts, and compliance records for vendors, computes risk scores, and produces concise reliability reports. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.

I have retrieved the compliance flags for Acme Corp. Below is a markdown summary of the findings. I will now generate a PDF from this summary.
